method.SaveDBTotalQuery: select count(*) as cant, sum(IF (mon_status='PENDIENTE' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_pendientes, sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_realizados, sum(IF (mon_status='CERRADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_cierre_forz, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='SI') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_ok, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='NO') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_mal, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and cap_status='PENDIENTE'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_pendientes, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and cap_status='REALIZADO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_realizados, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='SI'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_ok, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='NO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_mal, round( ( sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' ,ifnull(mon_puntaje,0),0)) / sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) ) ,2) as cirg_puntaje_prom FROM monitoreos m where 1 = 1

method.ObjFactoryQuery: SELECT cir_code, sum(IF (mon_status='PENDIENTE' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_pendientes, sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_realizados, sum(IF (mon_status='CERRADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_cierre_forz, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='SI') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_ok, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='NO') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_mal, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and cap_status='PENDIENTE'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_pendientes, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and cap_status='REALIZADO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_realizados, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='SI'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_ok, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='NO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_mal, round( ( sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' ,ifnull(mon_puntaje,0),0)) / sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) ) ,2) as cirg_puntaje_prom FROM monitoreos m where 1 = 1

method.ObjFactoryQuerySuffix: group by cir_code ORDER BY cir_code desc

method.SaveDBTotalQuery: select count(*) as cant, sum(IF (mon_status='PENDIENTE' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_pendientes, sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_realizados, sum(IF (mon_status='CERRADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_cierre_forz, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='SI') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_ok, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='NO') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_mal, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='PENDIENTE'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_pendientes, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_realizados, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='SI'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_ok, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='NO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_mal, round( ( sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' ,ifnull(mon_puntaje,0),0)) / sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) ) ,2) as cirg_puntaje_prom FROM monitoreos m where 1 = 1

method.ObjFactoryQuery: SELECT cir_code,use_code_supervisor, sum(IF (mon_status='PENDIENTE' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_pendientes, sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_realizados, sum(IF (mon_status='CERRADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_cierre_forz, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='SI') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_ok, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='NO') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_mal, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='PENDIENTE'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_pendientes, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_realizados, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='SI'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_ok, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='NO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_mal, round( ( sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' ,ifnull(mon_puntaje,0),0)) / sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) ) ,2) as cirg_puntaje_prom FROM monitoreos m where 1 = 1

method.ObjFactoryQuerySuffix: group by cir_code,use_code_supervisor ORDER BY cir_code desc,use_code_supervisor

method.SaveDBTotalQuery: select count(*) as cant,use_code_supervisor, sum(IF (mon_status='PENDIENTE' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_pendientes, sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_realizados, sum(IF (mon_status='CERRADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_cierre_forz, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='SI') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_ok, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='NO') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_mal, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_operador=m.use_code_operador and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='PENDIENTE'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_pendientes, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_operador=m.use_code_operador and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_realizados, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_operador=m.use_code_operador and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='SI'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_ok, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_operador=m.use_code_operador and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='NO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_mal, round( ( sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' ,ifnull(mon_puntaje,0),0)) / sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) ) ,2) as cirg_puntaje_prom FROM monitoreos m where 1= 1

method.ObjFactoryQuery: SELECT cir_code,use_code_operador,use_code_supervisor, sum(IF (mon_status='PENDIENTE' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_pendientes, sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_realizados, sum(IF (mon_status='CERRADO' , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_cierre_forz, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='SI') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_ok, sum(IF ((mon_status='REALIZADO' and mon_aprobo='NO') , 1 , 0)) as cirg_cant_mon_mal, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_operador=m.use_code_operador and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='PENDIENTE'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_pendientes, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_operador=m.use_code_operador and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_realizados, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_operador=m.use_code_operador and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='SI'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_ok, ifnull((select count(distinct cap_code) from capacitacion c where c.cir_code=m.cir_code and c.use_code_operador=m.use_code_operador and c.use_code_supervisor=m.use_code_supervisor and cap_status='REALIZADO' and cap_rol_play_aprobado='NO'),0) as cirg_cant_cap_mal, round( ( sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' ,ifnull(mon_puntaje,0),0)) / sum(IF (mon_status='REALIZADO' , 1 , 0)) ) ,2) as cirg_puntaje_prom FROM monitoreos m where 1= 1

method.SaveDBTotalQuery: select count(*) as cant from mon_items i join monitoreos m on m.mon_code = i.mon_code where not(mon_status='PENDIENTE')

method.ObjFactoryQuery: select count(*) as cantidad, avg(it_puntaje) as it_puntaje, sum(if (ifnull(it_aprobo,'')='SI',1,0)) as aprobados, sum(if (ifnull(it_aprobo,'')='NO',1,0)) as no_aprobados, sum(if (ifnull(it_perjuicio_cliente,'') ='SI',1,0)) as perjuicio, sum(if (ifnull(it_perjuicio_cliente,'') ='NO',1,0)) as no_perjuicio, it_code, cir_code,use_code_supervisor,use_code_operador from mon_items i join monitoreos m on m.mon_code = i.mon_code where not(mon_status='PENDIENTE')

method.ObjFactoryQuerySuffix: group by it_code, cir_code, use_code_supervisor, use_code_operador order by it_code, cir_code, use_code_supervisor, use_code_operador
